name: Student Survivor
description: This game is for my final project in my game engine class.  It is a 2d survivor game where the user must survive for several minutes by defeating monsters and levelling up to acquire new abilities and be able to progress to level 2. Within level 2 there is a secret arena where a new type of enemy is awakened and you must defeat these evil enemies in order to fight and reclaim the title of king in the underworld sanctum.
